text: Orta San Giulio is a comune in the Province of Novara in the Piedmont region in Italy. The town itself is built on a promontory which sticks out from the eastern bank of Lake Orta close to Isola San Giulio. It is well known for the nearby Sacro Monte, a site of pilgrimage and worship. In 2003, the Sacro Monte of Orta was added to the UNESCO World Heritage List. == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Official website for Sacro Monte * Official website Isola San Giulio Category:Settlements in Novara
title: Orta San Giulio
